1.「では 大魔王を裏切り| 我らに 味方するというのか？| にわかには 信じられん: So you betray the Great Demon King and side|with us? I find that hard to believe...

2.「あんな どこの馬の骨とも知れない若造に| 大魔王の座をくれてやるなんて 冗談じ:
It's no joke to give the title of Great Demon|King to such a young man who has no idea where|he came from. I'm not going to wag my tail to|
|him.

3.「アンタたちにとっても 悪い話じゃないだろ？| 目ざわりな大魔王を 俺たちの手で: It's not a bad idea for you, is it? Let's make|that annoying Great Demon King disappear with|our own hands, shall we?

5.「誰か 助けて……。| ここから 出して……。: Somebody help me... get me out of here...

7.「キミは……？| 優しくて あたたかな光を感じる……。: Are you...? I feel a gentle, warm light...

10.「目が覚めたら 知らないところにいて……| あの恐ろしい連中につかまって ここに: I woke up in a strange place... and those|horrible people grabbed me and put me here...

11.「自分の名前以外 何も 思いだせない……。| 僕は いったい……？: I can't remember anything but my own name...|what am I...?

12.「あーぁ。やっと終わったぜ。 | すっかり 待たせちまったみたいだな。: Ahhh. It's finally over. Looks like I made you|guys wait a long time.

13.「そいつが ヤツらの言う いけにえの人間か。| 戦勝祈願に いけにえを捧げる儀式:
That's the sacrificial human they're talking|about. They have a ceremony to offer|sacrifices to pray for victory. How old-|
|fashioned...

14.「……なんか 話してたみたいだったが| アンタの 知り合いかい？: I heard you guys talking about something.

15.「……なるほどねぇ。| アストルティアから 迷いこんだのかもな。| たまーにいる: I see. Maybe they wandered in from Astoltia.|There are people like that once in a while.|There are idiots like that.

17.「おっと 今はコイツのことはいい。| 本題に入ろう。: Oops, let's not talk about this guy right now.|Let's get down to business.

18.「ヤツら まんまと引っかかってくれたぜ。| 天下のバルディスタ軍と 俺様の智謀が: They got it all figured out. Valdista's army|and my wits and brains are all over the place,|and we're as happy as if we'd won.

19.「大魔王城を攻める前に 決起集会を| 開くらしくてな。反乱の首謀者を始め| 組織:
They're going to hold a rally before they|attack Great Demon King's castle. I heard that|the ringleaders of the rebellion and other key|
|figures in the organizat[...]

20.「そこを 協力者と見せかけた バルディスタ兵が| 一気にたたく！ アンタも 大魔:
Valdista Soldiers, pretending to be|collaborators, smashed him at once! You, as|the Great Demon King, can go wild as much as|
|you like.

21.「……残念だが コイツは このままだ。| しばらく いけにえのまま いてもらう。: I'm sorry, but he's going to stay as he is.|He'll remain a sacrificial animal for a while.

22.「戦勝祈願の儀式とやらが 終わる前までに| 助けてやれば 文句ないだろ？| 今は:
If we can get him out of there before the|victory rituals are over, I'm sure you won't|have any complaints. We can't cause trouble|
|now.

23.「決起集会は ジャリムバハ砂漠の| 北西にある 砂塵の遺跡で開かれるらしい。|: The rally is supposed to be held at Dust|Ruins, northwest of Jyarimbaha Desert. Let's|head there.

24.「ここから先は 何が起きるか わからねえ。| しっかり 準備しとけよ？| くれぐ: You never know what might happen from here on|out. So be prepared, okay? You won't regret|it...

27.「魔界解放軍の 同志たちよ！| 我らは 同じ旗のもとに……: Comrades of the Liberation Army of Demon|World! Under the same banner...

28.「うおおおおおおおッ！| 大魔王を ブッ殺せぇぇーーッ！: Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa! Kill the Great Demon|King!

30.「……うるさァーーーいッ！| 人の話は 最後まで静かに 聞かんかッ！！: Shut up! Will you listen quietly to the end of|what I have to say!

32.「魔界解放軍の 同志たちよ！| 我らは 同じ旗のもとに集った！| 大魔王を討つと:
Comrades of the Army of Demon World|Liberation! We are gathered under the same|banner! For the purpose of defeating the Great|
|Demon King!

33.「バルディスタの参謀 ベルトロどのも| 我が軍の志に賛同くださり ご加盟いただい: Valdista's chief of staff, Mr. Bertolo, has|agreed to join our army! With their help, we|will be victorious!

34.「我らは 大魔王を倒し 魔界を解放する！| どこの馬の骨かも わからんヤツに|:
We will defeat the Great Demon King and|liberate Demon World! We will not leave Demon|World in the hands of a man who has no idea|
|where he comes from!

35.「大魔王の座は 真に魔界を憂う者…… | このゴッツェにこそ ふさわしい！| 私:
The position of Great Demon King belongs to|the one who truly cares about Demon World,|Gotze! I will lead Demon World to a better|
|future!

36.「さぁ！ 我らの勝利を祈願して| いけにえを 捧げるのだ！: Come on! Let us offer up our sacrifices in|prayer for our victory!

38.「どういうことも 何も| テメーらが 間抜けだってだけさ。: What does that mean? It just means you're|stupid.

39.「我らバルディスタが 仕えるのは| 魔王ヴァレリアと こちらにいらっしゃる| 大: We Valdistas serve only the Demon Queen|Valeria and the Great Demon King over here.

40.「テメーらに振る しっぽなんて| 最っ初から 持ち合わせちゃいねェんだよ。| ヴ: I don't have a tail to wag for you guys from|the very beginning. You idiot.

42.「……これが 俗にいう 絶体絶命というやつか。| だが まだ 負けたわけではない: ...This is what is commonly referred to as a|desperate situation. But we haven't lost yet!|If we defeat you here, victory will be ours!

45.「見ろ！ この姿を！| 俺こそが！ 真の大魔王だァァァ！！: Look at me! Look at me! I am the one! The true|Great Demon King!

47.「魔瘴をあびて ピンピンしてやがる……！| あのガキ いったい何者なんだ？: He's still alive and well after all that demon|miasma...! Who the hell is that kid?

48.「おっと こうしちゃいられねえ。| ここから先は アンタの仕事だ。: Oh, man, I can't do this. You're in charge|from here on out.

49.「見りゃわかるだろ？| あんな おっかないの 俺には荷が重すぎる。| アンタの: You can see that, can't you? I'm too much of a|burden for such an ominous thing. Let's see|how you do.

50.「偉大なる 大魔王様！| 愚かなる反逆者に 制裁を！: Great Demon King! I bring down the traitor to|the earth!

51.「……せっかく あの道化師から| 特別製の魔瘴石を もらったのに。| くぅぅぅぅ: I went to the trouble of getting a special|miasma stone from that clown. Ughhhh...!

52.「………で？| 一応 謀反の理由を 聞かせてもらおうか？: So...so? Shall we hear the reason for the|insurrection, just in case?

53.「理由だと！？ 理由なんて ソイツが| 大魔王になったからに 決まってるじゃない: Reason? Of course it's because he became the|Great Demon King!

54.「ヴァレリアとかアスバルとか 大魔王になるなら| そういう大物だと 思ってた。俺:
I thought it would be Valeria or Asbal or|something like that if I was going to be a|Great Demon King. I didn't go to the Demongate|
|because I thought I couldn't do it anyway.

55.「それなのに フタを開けてみたら！| コイツみたいな ぽっと出の地味なヤツが|: And yet, when I opened the lid! A simple, out-|of-the-box guy like him is the Great Demon|King!

56.「コイツが なれるなら | 誰が大魔王になったって いいじゃん！| 俺がなったっ: If he can become the Great Demon King, then|who cares who becomes the Great Demon King! I|don't care if it's me!

57.「俺だって！ 大魔王に！| なりたかったんだよぉぉぉぉーーーーーッ！！: Me too! Great Demon King! I wanted to be a|great demon king!

58.「……だが 戦ってみて わかった。| コイツは ただの 地味顔じゃない。| ……: But when I fought him, I realized. This is not|just a plain face. ...This is the true Great|Demon King.

59.「わかってんじゃねーか。: You know what I'm talking about.

60.「じゃ 大魔王様！| コイツら ひと思いに やっちゃってください！: Great Demon King! Let's take them all out at|once!

61.「ひえええ……命だけは 勘弁してください！| 俺たち 心を入れ替えます！| あな: Please don't kill me! We'll change our minds!|We'll change our minds! We pledge our|allegiance to you! You're right!

62.ゴッツェたちを 許しますか？<yesno><close>: Do you forgive Gotze and the others?|<yesno><close>

63.「うわぁーーん！ そんなこと 言わないで！| なんでもしますから！ この通り！<: Oh, my God! Don't say that! I'll do|anything! Just like this! <yesno><close>

64.「大魔王……いや 大魔王様！| 敵であった俺たちに 情けをかけるなんて| なぁん: Great Demon King...no, Great Demon King! How|dare you show mercy to us, your enemies!

65.「あなたは 俺たちの 恩人です！| 一生 あなたに ついていきます！: You are our benefactor! We will follow you for|the rest of our lives!

66.「大魔王様 バンザイ！| 偉大なる その名に 栄光あれ！: Great Demon King, hooray! Glory to your great|name!

67.「……ここだけの話。ちょっとだけ| 部下といっしょに 反乱軍に| 寝返っちまおう: Between you and me. I was thinking of turning|over to the rebels with my men for a bit.

68.「だが 今日の働きっぷりを見て| 寝返らなくて正解だったと 確信したね。| ……:
But after seeing how hard you worked today,|I'm convinced you were right not to turn. You|will be a moderately competent Great Demon|
|King.

69.「さーて……問題はコイツだな。| えっと ナラジアとか いったっけか？: Well... the problem is this guy. Narasia, or|was it something like that?

70.「お前 本当に 何者なんだ？| あれだけの魔瘴を浴びて 平気でいられるなんて|: Who are you really? I can't believe you're a|mere human being who can be exposed to that|much demon miasma and remain unaffected...

71.「……本当に 僕は 何も覚えていないんだ。| でも あの不気味な霧を見て| ひと: I really don't remember anything. But that|eerie fog reminded me of one thing...

72.「ここに来る前 深い霧の中に 僕らはいた。| 僕は ひとりでは なかったんだ……: Before we came here, we were in a deep fog. I|was not alone.

73.「僕に そっくりな女の子……| あの子がいたから 僕は…………。: I had a girl who looked just like me... and|she was the reason I...

74.「そういや コイツ よく見ると| 魔瘴の巫女に そっくりだよな。| ……たしか: Well, if you look closely, this guy looks just|like the maiden of miasma. I think her name is|Irusha, right?

76.「まあ ここで 考えてもしかたないか。| どう見ても 害はなさそうだしな。: Well, there's nothing to think about here. It|seems harmless enough.

77.「大魔王様は 当分 忙しいんだろ？| とりあえず バルディスタで預かっとくわ。: Great Demon King is busy for the time being,|right? I'll keep him at Valdista for now.

78.「よーし！ ナラジアくーん。| オジサンと いっしょに来てもらおうか……: Yo! Mr. Narasia. I'm gonna need you to come|with me and my old man...

80.「アイツ どこ行きやがった！: Where the fuck did he go?

81.「ちくしょーッ！ あのガキ！| ただでさえ 忙しいってのに| 面倒事 増やしやが: Damn it! That kid! He's just adding to the|hassle of my busy life!

82.「……このまま ほっといて| 死なれても 寝覚めがわりぃ。| アイツのことは 部: I don't want to wake up and leave him to die|like this. I'll have my men look for him.

83.「ほれ！ アンタは とっとと| ヴァレリアに 報告に行けよ。| あんまり待たせる: Come on! You should go report to Valeria right|away. You'll get hurt if you keep her waiting|too long.
